product_name: Fixe Hardware Bouldering Lake Tahoe: North/West Shore Edition
long_description: An authoritative guide with stunning pictures and helpful information, Bouldering Lake Tahoe is your gateway to enjoying the hundreds of fantastic bouldering challenges around California's Lake Tahoe.
short_description: An authoritative guide with stunning pictures and helpful information, Bouldering Lake Tahoe is your gateway to enjoying the hundreds of fantastic bouldering challenges around California's Lake Tahoe.
